casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jamie RIESON. No. 415P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Jamie Rieson, Asheboro, for Rieson, Jamie. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Craig Blitzer, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of December 2015 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

*479"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
